pages.text: $(li)The Fire Charge is a item that can be used to generate fire.$(br)$(li)Just right click while you are holding the Fire Charge and you are pointing towards a near surface.
$(li)It can be crafted placing Coal or Charcoal, Blaze Powder and Gunpowder in a Crafting Table.$(br)$(li)You can craft Torchs, Braziers, Charred Nether Bricks and Campfires with this item.
